mapper.select: SELECT dss.id, dss.site_id, dss.down_system_id, dss.task_max_count, dss.task_current_count FROM down_system_site dss left join site s on dss.site_id =s.id left join down_system ds on dss.down_system_id =ds.id where dss .enable_status = 1 and ds .enable_status = 1 and s.enable_status = 1 and dss.task_current_count < dss.task_max_count
select id, url_failed_retry_timeout from down_system_site t where t.url_next_failed_retry_job_time <current_timestamp and t.url_failed_retry_job_execute_interval != -1
select id, url_reset_timeout from down_system_site t where t.url_next_reset_job_time <current_timestamp and t.url_reset_job_execute_interval != -1
select id, url_cache_timeout from down_system_site t where t.url_next_cache_timeout_job_time <current_timestamp and t.url_cache_timeout_job_execute_interval != -1
